refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Access returns 0 if the access modes specified in perm are correct for the user to access fname. -1 is returned if the file cannot be accessed.
The value for perm may be any legal OS-9 mode as used for open() or creat(), it may be zero, which tests whether the file exists, or the path to it may be searched.

refsect1.title: Caveats
refsect1.para: NOTE that the perm value is not compatible with other systems.

refsect1.title: Diagnostics
refsect1.para: The appropiate error indication, if a value of -1 is returned, may be found in errno.
